mapper.sql: from product P left join product_articles PA on P.id = PA.product_id left join article A on A.article_id = PA.article_id
mapper.update:
UPDATE article A SET stock = stock - amount_of from ( select A.article_id, PA.amount_of, min(A.stock / PA.amount_of) quantity
where P.id = #{id} group by A.article_id, PA.amount_of ) PQ WHERE A.article_id = PQ.article_id and PQ.quantity > 0
